name: places/ChIJa4St0fLzwokRYXqfRMK0gCQ
adrFormatAddress: 5120 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
Beware of door-to-door salespeople trying to get you to connect to Spectrum. The sales rep named Mark Rohan showed up at my door in NJ and told me everything I wanted to hear but then sent me a bill that was completely different than what we discussed and he was anxious for me to activate the service I did not agree to.

Take notice that once they send you their product you have a limited time to return it before billing is triggered (even if you don't activate). Also, I was told that there would not be any promotional discounts on my bill because this company gives a flat rate fee that is much cheaper than what its competitors offer. The bill I was sent was packed with these promotions.

This experience has ruined any ounce of desire that I had to give Spectrum a try again.

originalText.text: THE ABSOLUTE WORST ON ALL LEVELS!!!!!
